title: "Moonlit Mountainscape"
content:
# Moonlit Mountainscape

Welcome to Moonlit Mountainscape, a website dedicated to showcasing the beauty and mystery of nature. Our stunning wallpaper features a full moon rising over a mountain range, shrouded in mist and clouds. 

Our website is a collection of breathtaking photographs and videos of landscapes from around the world. From the rugged peaks of the Himalayas to the serene beaches of the Caribbean, we aim to inspire our visitors with the majesty of nature.

Whether you're an avid hiker, a nature enthusiast, or simply someone who appreciates the beauty of the great outdoors, Moonlit Mountainscape has something for everyone. So sit back, relax, and let us take you on a journey through some of the most awe-inspiring landscapes on Earth.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of a full moon rising over a mountain range, with mist and clouds adding to the sense of mystery."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
